title: How to Make Banana Rum Pancakes

steps.headline: Prepare the pancakes.
steps.description: Follow the directions accordingly to the recipe of your choice.

steps.headline: Prepare the banana rum sauce.
steps.description: Over a low heat, melt the butter in a small sauce pot. Add all the other ingredients and stir continuously to avoid the mixture being burnt. Remove from the heat when the bananas have softened.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Add the pancakes to a serving platter. Drizzle the banana rum sauce on top.

text: Prepare the pancakes. Follow the directions accordingly to the recipe of your choice. Prepare the banana rum sauce. Over a low heat, melt the butter in a small sauce pot. Add all the other ingredients and stir continuously to avoid the mixture being burnt. Remove from the heat when the bananas have softened. Serve. Add the pancakes to a serving platter. Drizzle the banana rum sauce on top.
